channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.2)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.2)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.2 - 2023-10-10 # 1.5.2-beta.3 - 2023-10-10 # Fixed # New version notice remains after updating AAO without restarting UnityEditor #559 Freeze BlendShape may break Visame with MergeSkinnedMesh #561 1.5.2-beta.2 - 2023-10-10 # Added # More MMD BlendShapes are registered #552 New English Translation BlendShapes are compatible with AAO!
